statements: SELECT * FROM sex_offenders WHERE age > 18;
SELECT offender_name, address FROM sex_offenders WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT offender_id, offender_name, age FROM sex_offenders WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT offender_id, offender_name, address FROM sex_offenders WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 30;
SELECT * FROM sex_offenders WHERE gender = 'Female' AND address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY offender_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sex_offenders WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT offender_name, address FROM sex_offenders WHERE age > 30;
SELECT offender_id, offender_name, gender, age FROM sex_offenders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' OR address LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT * FROM sex_offenders WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY offender_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(age) AS oldest_age, MIN(age) AS youngest_age FROM sex_offenders;
SELECT * FROM registered_sex_offenders;
SELECT offender_name, offense_description FROM registered_sex_offenders;
SELECT DISTINCT offender_address FROM registered_sex_offenders;
SELECT offender_name, registration_date FROM registered_sex_offenders WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT rs.offender_name, or.restriction_description FROM registered_sex_offenders rs JOIN offender_restrictions or ON rs.offender_id = or.offender_id;
SELECT offender_id, offender_name, offender_address FROM registered_sex_offenders WHERE registration_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM registered_sex_offenders JOIN offender_restrictions ON registered_sex_offenders.offender_id = offender_restrictions.offender_id;
SELECT offender_name, offense_description FROM registered_sex_offenders WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT offender_name, offender_address, restriction_description FROM registered_sex_offenders JOIN offender_restrictions ON registered_sex_offenders.offender_id = offender_restrictions.offender_id WHERE registered_sex_offenders.offender_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM registered_sex_offenders ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM registered_offenders;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM registered_offenders WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT address, crime_committed FROM registered_offenders WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM offender_addresses WHERE state = 'CA' ORDER BY city, street_address DESC;
SELECT offender_id, photo_url FROM offender_photos WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM registered_offenders;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address, crime_committed FROM registered_offenders WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, address, registration_date FROM registered_offenders ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, a.street_address, a.city, a.state, a.zip_code FROM registered_offenders r JOIN offender_addresses a ON r.offender_id = a.offender_id;
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, p.photo_url, p.upload_date FROM registered_offenders r JOIN offender_photos p ON r.offender_id = p.offender_id;
SELECT * FROM sex_offenders;
SELECT offender_name, offender_age FROM sex_offenders WHERE offender_age > 30;
SELECT offender_name, offender_address FROM sex_offenders WHERE offender_address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT * FROM offense_types WHERE offense_category = 'Violent';
SELECT victim_name, victim_relation FROM offender_victims ORDER BY victim_relation ASC;
SELECT * FROM sex_offenders WHERE offender_age > 18;
SELECT offender_name, offender_address FROM sex_offenders WHERE offender_id = 5;
SELECT DISTINCT offense_category FROM offense_types;
SELECT offender_name, victim_name FROM sex_offenders INNER JOIN offender_victims ON sex_offenders.offender_id = offender_victims.offender_id;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM offender_locations WHERE offender_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM registered_sex_offenders;
SELECT name, age FROM registered_sex_offenders WHERE age > 30;
SELECT address, crime FROM registered_sex_offenders WHERE crime = 'Murder';
SELECT name, address, crime FROM registered_sex_offenders ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM offender_aliases WHERE alias_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM registered_sex_offenders WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, name, address FROM registered_sex_offenders WHERE crime = 'Murder'
SELECT r.name, l.* FROM registered_sex_offenders r JOIN offender_locations l ON r.id = l.offender_id WHERE l.timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY l.timestamp DESC
SELECT o.alias_name, p.photo_url FROM offender_aliases o JOIN offender_photos p ON o.offender_id = p.offender_id
SELECT * FROM offender_relations WHERE relation_type = 'Family' ORDER BY offender_id_1 ASC, offender_id_2 DESC
